name: Under Water Rio
description:
Under Water Rio is an awsome fish app. enjoy swimming in the ocean tap on the screen to avoid the obstacles,
you can choose one of the characters "Fishy,Nemo,Toots and Bubble" each fish has a diffrent style of swimming
on your way you can collect coins stars power-up even you can shrink the fish,
download now and enjoy the colorful ocean
fun game looks easy but difficult to master.
challenge your freinds how can have better score share on game centre, FaceBook and enjoy your play,
Download now for free and start your adventure
